meanings.sent1: The plant had nodular leaves that felt bumpy to the touch.
meanings.sent2: The doctor identified a nodular growth on the patient's skin.
meanings.sent3: The nodular pattern on the ceiling looked like tiny hills.
meanings.sent4: The nodular texture of the rock made it easy to grip.
meanings.sent5: The nodular surface of the moon was visible through the telescope.

meanings.sent5: The nodular appearance of the tree bark provided a unique aesthetic.
